DOC.brief_summary: This is an observational, naturalistic, multicenter, retrospective study to describe the therapeutic management of patients with moderate and severe psoriasis under treatment with topical and/or systemic drugs in usual clinical practice in Spain.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Management of Patients With Moderate and Severe Psoriasis
DOC.criteria: Main ·Over 18 years of age.·Diagnosed with moderate or severe psoriasis.·Initiated treatment with topical and/or systemic treatment between two and five years before enrollment in the study. ·Has a clinical record at the dermatologist office. Main ·Currently participating in a clinical study. ·Clinical record lacks minimum data required for observational analysis.
